Text:
(Yes... Now, the Seven Shadows'—the Shadow
Garden's real battle is about to begin.)
...Lady Alpha. We're all here.
Thank you, Beta.

Okay, let us begin our meeting on the future
direction of the Shadow Garden.
This place...isn't ideal. At all.

We don't have a choice, Eta. That "ready-built house"
stood out like a sore thumb in this ghost town.
Still...you didn't have to demolish it.
I'm...sleepy.

Me too... These "meetings" always make me sleepy...
*yawn*...
Fine. Don't bother getting up, but at least listen.

I've organized our current goals and compiled a list
of indicators and objectives for us moving forward.

Our top priority is investigating the Cult of Diablos
and researching the curse related to the possessed.

We've conducted investigations and research to this
point, but our focus now will be on gathering intel
from various locations.

This means more opportunities for direct
confrontations with the Cult. In light of this,
I have a proposal to make to you all.
A proposal?
Yes. I suggest...we use swords more actively.
Swords?
But why? Why can't I hunt 'em down with my claws?

When Shadow taught us to use a sword, he taught us
his own style of swordsmanship using a blade similar
to his own.

Then, he ordered us to train on our own and develop
our own unique style.

But the fact he taught all of us, the Seven Shadows,
the same swordsmanship...holds great significance
for the future of the Garden.

Because from now on, our swords will symbolize
the Shadow Garden's existence—they will be the
very swords Shadow himself wields!

I see... So you're suggesting, in addition to our
preferred weapons, we use our swords as a
way to represent the Garden.

Plus, by standardizing the sword instead of choosing
our various favorites, we can avoid the identification
of any individual Garden member!
Incredible! Master Shadow had it all planned out!

Each of us has our preferred fighting style. Shadow
must have told us to develop our individual talents
to prevent them from going to waste.

But if we're to embrace our role in the Garden fully,
we should aim to make our standard fighting style
and techniques as consistent as possible.

I don't dislike the sword, but it depends on
the circumstances.

Of course, if your work consists mainly of espionage,
like Zeta, it may be more convenient to use weapons
other than the sword to your advantage.
Ughh...
To be honest, I'm...not that interested...

Truth is, there are more than a few circumstances
where it's best to fight using your preferred style,
such as when up against a formidable opponent.

Let's leave it at something to strive toward for now,
but we should aim to eventually make it a reality.
Then I can keep using my claws for hunting?
Yes, but don't neglect your sword training.
Aww... Fine!

By the way, Lady Alpha, when it comes to both
expanding the Garden and maintaining its
secrecy, I believe there are limits to what
we can do with this place as our base.
Yes, you're right, Gamma.

That's why our first task in increasing our strength
is finding a new base as soon as possible.
A new...home!

With that in mind, here is our main agenda for today.
Beta?

Right. We've outlined each of our individual roles,
including the search for a new base.

Firstly...I, Alpha, will serve as the Shadow Garden's
commander in chief and supervisor.

I'll act as the leader, managing overall operations
while participating in missions and plans when
necessary.

In short, you can count on me as all-around support
except in highly specialized matters. It's a heavy
responsibility, but I'll do my best to carry out
my duties.

I, Beta, will be in charge of analyzing and
documenting intel, investigating the Cult,
and rescuing the possessed.

My duties will mostly consist of desk work, but I
will be actively involved in missions requiring
off-site intel gathering and investigations.

Gamma, you'll be responsible for managing
and coordinating the Garden as a whole.

The battle ahead will require financial and political
power that can influence the world.

In other words, the growth and capital needed for
the Garden to gain power will rely on my intellect.
Very well—leave it to me.
Delta, you'll specialize in direct combat.

This includes combat with the Cult of Diablos, which
is highly likely to occur while rescuing the possessed.

I'll fight those bastards! Leave it to me! I'm better
as a hunter, not a helper!

Epsilon, you'll be involved in the hands-on
operations of rescuing the possessed,
providing backup in various areas.
Wha... I'm taking a backseat role?!

It's a crucial job, Epsilon. Providing support under
various circumstances requires good sense and
careful attention to detail.

I believe it's a role only you are capable of
handling.

Lady Alpha... Very well! Leave it to me, for I am
Epsilon the Faithful!

Zeta, in addition to your search for Cult-related
intel, you'll—

Don't tell me you're stacking on more
responsibilities.

That's right, Zeta. We need you to find us
somewhere suitable to set up our next base.
A new potential den, huh? Fine.

Eta, besides your beneficial research and
development for the Garden, you'll also—
...Zzz...mnn...
Figured she'd end up falling asleep.

A shame. I was hoping to involve her in various
architectural matters for our soon-to-be
expanding number of bases.
Hm!
...Mmm...fine...I'll think 'bout it...muh...

She could at least clear up whether she's awake
or asleep.
Mmm...asleep...

Anyway, now we have our responsibilities. Let's
devote ourselves to what needs to be done.

Yes. From this moment forward, we, the Shadow Garden,
are quietly, but surely, taking our next step.
Need...bigger...base...than...this one...
